Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
### Install Package
```
pip3 install gappy
```
compatible python version: 3.4+

### How to use

#### Run with flask

Example:

```
import gappy
from flask import Flask
from flask import request

TOKEN = '<your token>'

bot = gappy.Bot(TOKEN)
app = Flask(__name__)


@app.route('/', methods=['POST'])
def parse_request():
    msg = request.form
    content_type = msg['type']
    chat_id = msg['chat_id']
    data = msg['data']
    bot.send_text(chat_id, data)
    return 'OK'


if __name__ == '__main__':
    app.run()
```
info.keywords: gap messenger bot api python wrapper
info.name: gappy
info.summary: Python framework for Gap Service API
info.html_description:
### Install Package
```
pip3 install gappy
```
compatible python version: 3.4+

### How to use

#### Run with flask

Example:

```
import gappy
from flask import Flask
from flask import request

TOKEN = '<your token>'

bot = gappy.Bot(TOKEN)
app = Flask(__name__)


@app.route('/', methods=['POST'])
def parse_request():
msg = request.form
content_type = msg['type']
chat_id = msg['chat_id']
data = msg['data']
bot.send_text(chat_id, data)
return 'OK'


if __name__ == '__main__':
app.run()
```
